name: Boons & Burdens
description:
Boons & Burdens is a single player, action-roguelike, bullet heaven set in the depths of a hellish dimension. Battle hordes of demons through 9 levels of evil, collect magical gems to purchase powerful boons, and unlock your true potential as one of many wizards. But beware! The path to power requires sacrifice. Each level requires you to choose a new burden that transforms the difficulty. Become the paragon of ultimate power, or the architect of your own downfall, and watch it all unfold in richly detailed, over-the-top pixel art.

Features

  • Two unique character classes with their own abilities and talents
  • More than 130 talents to discover and equip at launch
  • Huge, over-the-top super spells let you turn the tide of hectic battles
  • 9 increasingly difficult levels with over a dozen devious demons to battle
  • A unique "Burdens" system puts an evolving difficulty in your hands

  • Quick pick-up-and-play gameplay. Games last less than 30 minutes.
  • 20 Steam Achievements
  • Customize effects, colors, and controls, so anyone can stay focused on the action
  • Twin-Stick, 360-Degree Analog Control and Mouse and Keyboard supported
